text: Although this is set in the virtual host, executing a LIST from an FTP client does not show unauthorized folders - instead unauthorized folders are hidden.  The LIST function does return a directory listing when using standard FTP.  When connected over SSL, the LIST function does not even return a directory listing when there are unauthorized folders.
creator: jcook@lcog.org
wrowe@apache.org
text: Noted, will research, thanks for the report!

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: This sounds like another symptom of bug 58727 and not specific to mod_ftp.
